name: Tofunmi Adeyinka
role: Site Engineer at Calebella Integritas Projects
quote: ERA didn't just teach me engineering — they taught me how to be a professional. The site experience, mentorship, and soft skills training all came together. I was placed within two months of completing the programme.

name: Hamzah Babatunde
role: Project Coordinator at Black Diamond Engineering
quote: Before ERA, I could solve problems on paper but had never supervised a concrete pour. The hands-on training on active construction sites gave me confidence that no textbook ever could.

name: Wright Okonkwo
quote: The AutoCAD and structural drawing modules were exceptional. I went from struggling with basic commands to producing full structural detail drawings within four weeks. ERA's instructors are practising engineers — they teach what they do.

name: Adaeze Nwachukwu
role: Graduate Engineer at Julius Berger Nigeria
quote: What sets ERA apart is their industry connections. The internship placement connected me directly with a firm that matched my career goals. I was offered a full-time role before the programme even ended.

name: Emeka Okafor
quote: As a mechanical engineering graduate pivoting into construction, ERA gave me the practical foundation I needed. The site supervision module and concrete works training were exactly what employers were looking for.

name: Fatima Bello
quote: ERA's programme is intense but worth every naira. The quantity surveying and estimation skills I gained here are what I use every single day at work. The alumni network has also been invaluable for career growth.
